Text.Page:
I believe we could win some of the orcan tribes over if it weren't for the besharan merchants. {@LinkCreature:241#1022$$Paduk} says they sell the rock tribe a fiery liquor that incites them to violence.

Waylaying {@LinkCreature:41#2006#besharan smugglers} and {@LinkCreature:41#2002#enforcers} or their caiman {@LinkCreature:41#4010#porters} and {@LinkCreature:41#4009#guards} and taking their liquor might be the solution. Are you willing?
The besharans will not be so eager to poison the minds of the orcans now! Thank you.
Don't underestimate the besharansâ€”they're small, but fierce.
